backend/main.mo: Actor storing and retrieving per-caller canister IDs using a Map with a trap if unset.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide explaining how to verify deployments and force redeploys using the redeploy marker system.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Documentation for configuring a custom domain for the IC-hosted ElectroBeez canister, including DNS and registration steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode values, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element, favicon, metadata, and script loader for main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that renders the LandingPage and logs the REDEPLOY_MARKER for deployment verification.
frontend/src/components/landing/AmbientB: Component rendering animated ambient background orbs with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Top-level landing page layout composing sections with ambient background and navigation.
frontend/src/components/landing/SectionN: Sticky navigation bar with smooth scrolling, mobile menu, and contact info access.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: About section showing user and electrician features with icon cards and descriptive lists.
Renders a grid of benefit cards describing project advantages like job creation and instant service. Uses icons and styled cards for a landing page section.
Displays budget breakdown cards with amounts and descriptions plus a total budget call-to-action. Used for showing project funding needs.
Provides donation options including a YouTube video, QR code, and bank transfer details within a styled card. Encourages user contributions.
Renders footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, and director phone numbers. Pulls data from CONTACT config.
Landing hero section with a YouTube video, headline, description, CTAs, and feature highlight cards. Serves as the main introduction to the project.
Empty placeholder file for a future landing page section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, logout, and AuthClient creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, glassmorphism components, and ambient animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/contact.ts: Exports static contact information including email and a list of directors with phone numbers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/redeployMarker.ts: Contains a timestamped build marker used to force redeploys by changing the bundle hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, radii, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, including schema version, features, and deployment-related metadata.
